messages.text: Hello, this is Lisa from City Pharma. I'm calling regarding order PO-2025-1189. The expected delivery date was November 15th, but we haven't received the shipment yet. Can you help me track this order?
Hello Lisa, I apologize for the delay. Let me check the status of that order for you right away.

I see the issue. There was a delay at our warehouse due to a quality control check. The order was actually shipped this morning and is now in transit. It should arrive at your location by end of day tomorrow, November 17th.
I understand. Can you provide the tracking information? Also, will this delay affect future orders?

The tracking number is TRK-852147963. Regarding future orders, this was an isolated incident due to our enhanced quality control procedures. We don't anticipate any delays on upcoming shipments. We've also upgraded our logistics to prevent similar issues.
Thank you for the transparency. We appreciate the quality control, but it would be helpful to receive advance notice if there are any delays in the future.

Absolutely, you're right. We should have notified you earlier. We're implementing a new system that will automatically send email notifications for any delays. You'll be included in that system going forward.
That sounds great. We appreciate your commitment to improving communication. Thank you for your help today.
You're very welcome, Lisa. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience. If you need anything else, please don't hesitate to call. Have a great day!
